channel.title: photoshop on SpiderSoft
channel.description: Recent content in photoshop on SpiderSoft

item.title: Cut and slice Photoshop files really easy
item.description: This is one if these rare plugins which make my live lot easier. Actually can’t imagine my work without it.  Cut&Slice me  is able to export your assets to different devices in seconds. Whole idea is really simple – name objects, or groups in special way. Click one button – and all assets will be exported in proper file names. It’s getting event better – his plugin is able to export all assets in multiple dimensions (retina images). So… if you ever dreamt about perfect tool for you work – this is it.
